home.2: Shipping is free for purchases over 100,000 uzs!
home.5: “ALKIMYOGAR FARM” is the first and most successful company in the region that produces a wide range of colloidal minerals, as well as plant hydrolates for consumption with the effective use of nanotechnology based on partnership with Malaysian and Canadian companies. Thanks to the modern equipment and technologies available in our company, together with qualified specialists, it has the opportunity to produce high-quality products.

about.2: It is the first and most successful company in the region that produces a wide range of colloidal minerals and plant hydrolates for consumption based on cooperation with Malaysian and Canadian companies, using nano technology effectively. With the help of modern equipment and technologies available in our company, together with qualified specialists, it is possible to produce high-quality products.
about.4: Alkimyogar Farm Company is engaged in the production of high-quality colloidal minerals and medicinal extracts made from medicinal plants based on Canadian nanotechnology. The extracts are hydrolatted, and it is the first company in the CIS countries to release them for consumption! The company was founded in 2019, and in this short time it has more than 20 product ranges and more than 5000 satisfied customers. The company aims to contribute to the health of the nation by producing quality, natural and affordable products. set a goal.

tanlov.2: ALKIMYOGAR FARM company has been producing products to strengthen a healthy lifestyle since the first day of its establishment. Our mission is to create products that help people live healthy lives and share health.
tanlov.4: We are manufacturers of high-quality products that fully comply with world standards. We have a well-educated, highly qualified team, modern, well-equipped buildings and conditions that meet all the requirements of the regulations and legislation of the Republic of Uzbekistan. we will take Each product has undergone extensive and practical testing. Starting from the packaging of the product, every element is created with originality and quality superiority.
tanlov.6: Modern technical capabilities of our nanotechnology, hydrolatation method laboratory allow production of products that meet all international standards. The professionalism of our highly qualified employees is a guarantee of the quality of manufactured medical products.
tanlov.8: It is one of the main principles established in the philosophy of our company. We highly respect the trust of our clients, value their time, do not set unattainable goals and maintain our reputation at a high level. That's why working with us is always reliable.
